definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: The main difficulty of off-line handwritten signature verification is feature extraction.
sentences.chinese: 离线手写签名鉴别的主要困难在于签名特征的提取。

sentences.english: There are two ways in structuring handwritten documents, off-line and on-line.
sentences.chinese: 目前关于手写文档的结构化，分为联机和脱机两种。

sentences.english: A system of handwritten Chinese characters recognition based on feedback structure is constructed.
sentences.chinese: 构建一种基于反馈结构的手写体汉字识别系统。

sentences.english: Drawing can be done with a finger or a stylus.
sentences.chinese: 绘图可以用手指或手写笔。

sentences.english: When you're satisfied with a final draft, handwrite it and put it in a picture frame.
sentences.chinese: 定稿后，用手写一份放在相框里。
手写多些信和咭给别人。

sentences.english: If you hand-write your responses, please write legibly.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是手写答案，请字迹工整。

sentences.english: Compare the first three letters with the last 'n'. That's a real cursive.
sentences.chinese: 把前面3个和最后一个相比较，没错，这才是手写体。

sentences.english: Write slowly and by hand only about subjects that interest you.
sentences.chinese: 慢慢地手写那些令你感兴趣的主题。

sentences.english: A novel recognition method called Active Discriminant Function (ADF) for handwriting recognition is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种新的基于主动判别函数的手写体识别方法。

sentences.english: For handwriting, please complete every item in block letters and in black or blue ink.
sentences.chinese: 如手写请用黑色或深蓝色原子笔，以正楷填写本表格。

sentences.english: This paper presents an approach to perceptually extract multi-oriented text lines from online handwriting.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种多方向手写笔迹文本行的提取方法。

sentences.english: I suggest a hand-written thank you note to follow up from an interview.
sentences.chinese: 我建议在面试结束后手写一封感谢信。

sentences.english: Phone can now be unlocked when stylus is removed.
sentences.chinese: 电话在上锁时，取出手写笔可解锁。

sentences.english: The method of handwritten digit recognition based on written direction is adopted.
sentences.chinese: 采用了一种基于笔道方向的手写体数字识别的方法。

sentences.english: A new method for the input, of handwritten Chinese characters is put forword.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了手写汉字输入的一种新方法。

definition: to transcribe/to make a fair copy
to write without lifting one's pen from the paper/(in the Romanization of Chinese) to write two or more syllables together as a single word (not separated by spaces)
book/notebook/Japanese-style self-published comic (esp. an erotic one), aka "dōjinshi"/CL:本[ben3]/edition
